description: A modern React conference website built with TanStack Start, featuring routing, SSR, and AI integration

stories.title: Setup project structure and routing
stories.description: Configure the initial project structure with React Router and ensure all routes are properly defined and accessible. This includes setting up the root layout, implementing nested routing patterns, and verifying that route parameters and queries work correctly.
acceptance_criteria: Project builds successfully with no errors
All routes are accessible and return 200 status

stories.title: Implement server-side rendering
stories.description: Ensure proper SSR functionality is working. The application should render on the server and hydrate correctly on the client. This includes proper handling of async data, loading states, and SEO-related meta tags.
acceptance_criteria: SSR renders correct HTML on initial load
Meta tags are properly rendered for SEO

stories.title: Implement data fetching layer
stories.description: Set up a robust data fetching layer using TanStack Query (React Query). This includes configuring the query client, implementing proper caching strategies, handling loading and error states, and integrating with the SSR flow.
acceptance_criteria: Data is fetched and cached correctly
Loading and error states are displayed

stories.title: Build reusable component library
stories.description: Create a set of reusable UI components following the design system. Components should be accessible, responsive, and properly typed. This includes buttons, forms, cards, modals, and other common UI elements.
acceptance_criteria: Components have unit tests with good coverage

stories.title: Implement form handling
stories.description: Create form handling utilities and components using a form library (such as TanStack Form or React Hook Form). Forms should have proper validation, error handling, and submission logic.
acceptance_criteria: Form submission handles success and error states

stories.title: Add Remy AI assistant
stories.description: Implement the Remy AI assistant feature for the conference website. This includes the chat UI, API integration with AI provider, and proper state management for conversations.
acceptance_criteria: Chat UI is accessible and responsive
API calls to AI provider work correctly
Loading and error states are handled

stories.title: Content collections integration
stories.description: Set up content collections for speakers and talks. Ensure markdown files are properly parsed, transformed, and available throughout the application.

stories.title: Set up testing infrastructure
stories.description: Configure comprehensive testing including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests. Ensure proper test coverage and CI integration.
acceptance_criteria: Unit tests pass with good coverage
E2E tests cover critical user journeys

stories.title: Configure deployment pipeline
stories.description: Set up automated deployment to Cloudflare Pages (or other hosting). This includes environment configuration, build optimization, and health checks.

stories.title: Optimize performance
stories.description: Identify and resolve performance bottlenecks. Implement code splitting, lazy loading, and other optimizations to ensure fast load times and smooth interactions.
acceptance_criteria: Code splitting is implemented for routes
Lazy loading works for heavy components
